thread.title: SUPER FAIL: Audi accidentally debunked their dumb Super Bowl ad on pay equality
thread.title_full: SUPER FAIL: Audi accidentally debunked their dumb Super Bowl ad on pay equality

author: Greg P.
title: SUPER FAIL: Audi accidentally debunked their dumb Super Bowl ad on pay equality
text:
SUPER FAIL: Audi accidentally debunked their dumb Super Bowl ad on pay equality Posted at 9:54 pm on February 5, 2017 by Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Not only was that Audi ad during the Super Bowl on pay equality tone deaf because of the male-female mix of its U.S. leadership team… ICYMI: Audi USA’s 12 man, 2 woman executive team is lecturing Super Bowl viewers with an ad on pay equality https://t.co/cnPfBrbaKq 
— Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) February 6, 2017 
…but they accidentally debunked the main message of the ad in a response to their original posting of the ad earlier in the week! 
Here’s the original tweet: Women are still paid 21% less than men. As a brand that believes in progress, we are committed to equal pay for equal work. #DriveProgress pic.twitter.com/bmQKrNr9l4
